attributes.action: Allow the natural order of the food chain to proceed unhindered.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
We hereby request that shambo be allowed a natural life cycle, like all other livestock and be served up, preferably in a good burger or a medium rare steak at a resturant of the peoples choice.
It is unfair and a breach of the animal rights of other livestock that shambo is allowed to bypass the natural food chain. 
This is discrimination of the highest order and must not be allowed as it risks setting a precedent, thereby allowing all other livestock to seek legal remedies which would cost billions and in the end, we the tax payers would have to foot the bill.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
